page.title: 14ATTITUDES OF CHILDREN.
page.content: Rowan and Kate decided to look at Eyam through their own and other childrens eyes.They made out a time table of their typical days when at school and when on holiday.They also asked other village children of differing ages what they thought about living in the area. Most of the children spoken to had a hobby such as ballet, football and gardening. When asked about entertainment in the village they got some very interesting answers.Most children wanted a BMX course on what they call the Sludge Dam, which is near the playing fields and behind the church. Many of children agreed that there was not enough (entertainment) to occupy them and agreed that there should be at least more entertainment around the area. <CONT PAGE 15.>
